mapper.insert: insert into IQ_APPLICATION_ORDER_COLUMN (PK_ID, APP_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, ORDER_TYPE,NOTE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IQ_APPLICATION_ORDER_COLUMN set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE=#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, APP_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, ORDER_TYPE,NOTE from IQ_APPLICATION_ORDER_COLUMN
